title: Why was Twitter Feed from News Artlicle Blocked containing infromation regarding Executives of Twitter decision to ban Donald Trump?  This is not ethical behavior and not what I agreed with using Firefox!
content:
When I read news articles regarding the new ownership of Twitter and the prior emails and conversations regarding their choice to ban certain politicians from Twitter....I did not expect for FireFox to interfere with those feeds....but they did! I thought FireFox was one of the honest browsers I could use and not politically motivated and banning information from viewers!?! This was simply a news article about how the prinicipals of Twitter took actions against the President of the U.S. to ban his Twitter account and yet I can not hear or read the Feeds??? I was on Standard Security settings recommended to keep me safe???? Why was this information blocked from me???? If FIREFOX HAS BECOME POLITICAL AND AN ALLIANCE AGAINST A POLITICIAN OR A POLITICAL PARTY....I NEED TO KNOW....NOW! NEWS ARTICLE I AM REFERRING TO IS: https://100percentfedup.com/breaking-newly-released-twitterfiles-prove-former-head-of-trust-safety-yoel-roth-met-weekly-with-fbi-dhs-and-dni-leading-up-to-2020-elections/

FIREFOX....YOUR REPLY IS IMPORTANT ASAP!
creator: lori.wood

title: google docs in firefox browser
content:
My icons on google docs are invisible only in the firefox browser. If I mouse over their location then the words for the icon appear and I know where to click.

I included a pictures.

Jen
creator: jkelsonsca

title: Firefox theme changing
content: I am attempting to find a "theme" that is clear and easily read. I'm unable to find one that I really like, but have found one that will do. But, every time the program starts, the theme reverts back to something called "system theme" which is not easily legible at all. What is the problem here? What is the solution? Thanks
creator: airwilly
